channel.title: TeamScape
channel.description: I was looking at the old Runescape videos on youtube and somehow got side tracked and started looking at luring videos in Clan Wars. I got an idea for a PKing server but you need a Team/Clan to go into the wild or outside of home or wherever PvP is. I think there are alot of server based on individual PKing but not with Teams/Clans and that was one of the funnest parts in old Runescape or even today's Runescape ( even though it's so shitty now ). I dont really have any pictures because i havent started but IDK leave comments giving me your feedbac on is this a good idea? Or just forget about it. Thanks guys :D [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=O2_WXmS6htk[/youtube]
